title.rendered: The Lamborghini Aventador SVJ is coming to Prestige Motorcars!

content.rendered:
When you think of Lamborghini, what usually comes to mind is their high performance V12 models that always seem to be a spectacle when you see it in real life. 

They have introduced different versions of the Aventador – their latest V12 model. We’ve seen the 50th Anniversario, SV, Aventador S. However – now we have the newest and most powerful version of it to date – the Aventador SVJ. 

Prestige Motorcars is happy to announce that we are now taking orders for your Lamborghini SVJ today!

  • Page Builder
  • Seasons
  • Women
